post.description: Gets a URL with SAS token for a container/blob in the storage account associated with the workspace. The SAS URL can be used to upload job input and/or download job output.

parameters.name: blobDetails
parameters.description: The details (name and container) of the blob.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

message.description: A human-readable representation of the error.

details.description: An array of details about specific errors that led to this reported error.

innererror.description: An object containing more specific information than the current object about the error.

Azure.Core.Foundations.InnerError.description: An object containing more specific information about the error. As per Azure REST API guidelines - https://aka.ms/AzureRestApiGuidelines#handling-errors.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

BlobDetails.description: The details (name and container) of the blob to store or download data.

CostEstimate.description: The job cost billed by the provider. The final cost on your bill might be slightly different due to added taxes and currency conversion rates.

DimensionScope.description: The scope at which the quota is applied to.

values.name: Workspace
values.description: The quota is applied to the Quantum Workspace.

values.name: Subscription
values.description: The quota is applied to the Azure Subscription.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

message.description: A human-readable representation of the error.

details.description: An array of details about specific errors that led to this reported error.

innererror.description: An object containing more specific information than the current object about the error.

name.description: The name of the item. It is not required for the name to be unique and it's only used for display purposes.

providerId.description: The unique identifier for the provider.

target.description: The target identifier to run the job.

itemType.description: Type of the Quantum Workspace item

creationTime.description: The creation time of the item.

beginExecutionTime.description: The time when the item began execution.

endExecutionTime.description: The time when the item finished execution.

ItemType.description: The type of the workspace item.

values.name: Job
values.description: A program, problem, or application submitted for processing.

JobDetails.description: A job to be run in the workspace.

sessionId.description: The ID of the session that the job is part of.

containerUri.description: The blob container SAS uri, the container is used to host job data.

inputDataUri.description: The input blob URI, if specified, it will override the default input blob in the container.

inputDataFormat.description: The format of the input data.

metadata.description: The job metadata. Metadata provides client the ability to store client-specific information

cancellationTime.description: The time when a job was successfully cancelled.

tags.description: List of user-supplied tags associated with the job.

inputParams.description: The input parameters for the job. JSON object used by the target solver. It is expected that the size of this object is small and only used to specify parameters for the execution target, not the input data.

outputDataUri.description: The output blob uri. When a job finishes successfully, results will be uploaded to this blob.

outputDataFormat.description: The format of the output data.

values.name: Waiting
values.description: The job is waiting in the queue to be executed.

JsonPatchDocument.description: A JSONPatch document as defined by RFC 6902.

JsonPatchObject.description: A JSONPatch object as defined by RFC 6902.

value.description: A value to be used in the operation on the path.

from.description: Optional field used in copy and move operations.

MeterPeriod.description: The time period in which the quota's underlying meter is accumulated. Based on calendar year. 'None' is used for concurrent quotas.

values.name: None
values.description: The meter period is instantaneous. Used for concurrent quotas.

values.name: Monthly
values.description: The meter period is per month.

value.description: The ItemDetails items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

value.description: The JobDetails items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

value.description: The ProviderStatus items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

value.description: The Quota items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

value.description: The SessionDetails items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

values.name: Degraded
values.description: Provider is available with degraded experience.

count.description: The number of quantum computing items in the job.

dimension.description: The name of the dimension associated with the quota.

scope.description: The scope at which the quota is applied.

providerId.description: The unique identifier for the provider.

utilization.description: The amount of the usage that has been applied for the current period.

holds.description: The amount of the usage that has been reserved but not applied for the current period.

limit.description: The maximum amount of usage allowed for the current period.

period.description: The time period in which the quota's underlying meter is accumulated. Based on calendar year. 'None' is used for concurrent quotas.

sasUri.description: A URL with a SAS token to upload a blob for execution in the given workspace.

SessionDetails.description: Session, a logical grouping of jobs.

jobFailurePolicy.description: Policy controlling the behavior of the Session when a job in the session fails.

SessionJobFailurePolicy.description: Policy controlling the behavior of the Session when a job in the session fails.

values.name: Abort
values.description: New jobs submitted after a job fails will be rejected.

values.name: Continue
values.description: New jobs submitted after a job fails will be accepted.

values.name: Waiting
values.description: The session is waiting in the queue to be executed.

values.name: Failure(s)
values.description: The session completed with some failures.

values.name: Degraded
values.description: Target is available with degraded experience.

statusPage.description: A page with detailed status of the provider.

Azure.Core.Foundations.ApiVersionParamet.description: The API version to use for this operation.
